labs.title: Extending Kubernetes API with CRDs
labs.description: Learn to extend Kubernetes by creating Custom Resource Definitions and building operators with Kubebuilder.

labs.title: Kubernetes Admission Webhooks
labs.description: Build and deploy mutating and validating admission webhooks to enforce custom policies in your cluster.

labs.title: K8SGPT - AI-Powered Cluster Analysis
labs.description: Use K8SGPT to diagnose and troubleshoot Kubernetes cluster issues with AI assistance.
